reviews.review: El padre de los shoter!! Un juego para tener en el escritorio siempre.

The gameplay is fun. Interacting with the community is not. Toxic, rude and about as offensives as one can get. You have a bad day? Massive homosexual noob whose mother is a pig. You dare to tell flaming people to shut up? Noob as well. You use a weapon that is considered a "noob weapon"? Self-explanatory. 
And the game punishes you for losing your internet connection with 2 hour bans and stuff. I think they also lower your trust factor, which means your games will only become more toxic.
(I do get that this is to prevent people from just cutting their internet connection to leave games without punishment, but still)
The trust factor system is pretty weird too, a friend of mine, really friendly and a fairly good player, has a really low trust factor for no reason and his account his pretty old, he has a bunch of games and hours on it and never received a vac ban or anything. 
Stupid. Play at own risk, preferably with a full team of friends.

Always has and always will be one of the most respected shooters. It has a high skill ceiling with can turn people off. But once you step outside of the "noob" stage of the game and get the mechanics down, you'll love it. Everybody should have this is their steam library without a question.

The phrase “it’s just a game” is such a weak mindset. You are ok with what happened, losing, imperfection of a craft. When you stop getting angry after losing, you’ve lost twice. 

There’s always something to learn, and always room for improvement, never settle.
